    AGPlot Class

    AGPlot.Rd

    The main plot class that handles all visualizations

    Methods

    Public methods

    • AGPlot$new()

    • AGPlot$add_layer()

    • AGPlot$add_scale()

    • AGPlot$set_theme()

    • AGPlot$set_facet()

    • AGPlot$set_coord()

    • AGPlot$add_annotation()

    • AGPlot$compute_ranges()

    • AGPlot$collect_legends()

    • AGPlot$plot()

    • AGPlot$clone()

    Method new()

    Create a new plot object

    Usage

    AGPlot$new(data = NULL)

    Arguments

    data

    A data frame containing the data to plot

    Method add_layer()

    Add a new layer to the plot

    Usage

    AGPlot$add_layer(layer)

    Arguments

    layer

    A layer object to add to the plot

    Method add_scale()

    Add a scale to the plot

    Usage

    AGPlot$add_scale(scale)

    Arguments

    scale

    A scale object to add to the plot

    Method set_theme()

    Set the theme for the plot

    Usage

    AGPlot$set_theme(theme)

    Arguments

    theme

    A theme object

    Method set_facet()

    Set the faceting specification for the plot

    Usage

    AGPlot$set_facet(facet)

    Arguments

    facet

    A facet object

    Method set_coord()

    Set the coordinate system for the plot

    Usage

    AGPlot$set_coord(coord)

    Arguments

    coord

    A coordinate system object

    Method add_annotation()

    Add an annotation to the plot

    Usage

    AGPlot$add_annotation(annotation)

    Arguments

    annotation

    An annotation object

    Method compute_ranges()

    Calculate plot ranges from data and layers

    Usage

    AGPlot$compute_ranges()

    Method collect_legends()

    Collect legends from layers

    Usage

    AGPlot$collect_legends()

    Method plot()

    Render the plot

    Usage

    AGPlot$plot()

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    AGPlot$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
